column5: anyone live in this area? id like to head up on saturday but i dont want to make a wasted 2 hr trip... can anyone let me know what these rivers are like? flooded/mud? should be ok by saturday  ?  thanks

I live about 50 mins east of there. All rivers in this area are very high & muddy. I suspect both rivers are also very high & muddy also. The area's between where I live and these rivers have been getting even more rain than here. I'd be very amazed if the rivers will drop a lot or clean up much by the weekend.  Best Wishes: Rick
